item.title: Meet the Indie Producer Who Got a Cease-and-Desist From Donald Trump
item.description: For ‘The Apprentice’ producer Daniel Bekerman, receiving legal threats from the president was just part of the job: “He’s in the entertainment business more than the political one.”

item.title: Fox News Has Millions More Viewers Than Any Rival. Did It Play Hardball to Get There?
item.description: Newsmax filed a lawsuit claiming that the Lachlan Murdoch-run news giant blocks competitors by coercing pay TV operators, threatening steep financial penalties if they add Newsmax.

item.title: Fox News Has Millions More Viewers Than Any Rival. Did It Play Hardball to Get There?
item.description: Newsmax filed a lawsuit claiming that the Lachlan Murdoch-run news giant blocks competitors by coercing pay TV operators, threatening steep financial penalties if they add Newsmax.

item.title: YouTube TV May Drop Fox News, Fox Local TV and More Channels in Contract Dispute
item.description: YouTube TV’s millions of subscribers could lose Fox News, FS1, local Fox TV stations and more as soon as this Wednesday if the Google-owned video service can’t reach a deal with Fox Corp.

item.title: YouTube TV May Drop Fox News, Fox Local TV and More Channels in Contract Dispute
item.description: YouTube TV’s millions of subscribers could lose Fox News, FS1, local Fox TV stations and more as soon as this Wednesday if the Google-owned video service can’t reach a deal with Fox Corp.

item.title: Fox and Fox News at Risk of Being Pulled From YouTube TV in Carriage Dispute
item.description: Fox began warning customers Monday that its channels could be pulled from YouTube TV on Wednesday unless they reach a new deal soon.

item.title: Bill Hemmer Wants to Be at the Center of the Story
item.description: The TV news business is in flux, but the veteran Fox News anchor believes that it has a place in a world being rapidly disrupted.
